Quackbot.info
Class Admin

java.lang.Object
  jpersist.PersistentObject
      jpersist.Entity
          Quackbot.info.Admin
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Admin
extends jpersist.Entity

Bean that holds all known Admin information. This is meant to be integrated with JPersist and the database. Only configure if going to add to database, otherwise let JPersist configure it.

If this needs to be changed in database, call updateDB()

See Also:

updateDB

public Admin updateDB()
Utility to update the database with the current Admin object.

WARNING: Passing an empty or null server object might destroy the database's knowledge of the server. Only JPersist generated Server objects should be passed

This is a convience method for
try { save(Controller.instance.dbm); catch (Exception e) { updating database", e); }

Returns:
Admin object with database generated info set

getChannelID

public Integer getChannelID()
The ID of the channel the admin might be attached to. Can be null

A null value indicates this isn't attached to a channel. The admin can either be server admin or global admin

Returns:
the channelID

setChannelID

public void setChannelID(Integer channelID)
The ID of the channel the admin might be attached to. Can be null

A null value indicates this isn't attached to a channel. The admin can either be server admin or global admin

Parameters:
channelID - the channelID to set

getServerID

public Integer getServerID()
The ID of the server the admin might be attached to. Can be null

A null value indicates the admin isn't attached to a server. They must be a global admin.

Returns:
the serverID

setServerID
